ValidationRule.description: Early Pay Tiers can be deleted, but values cannot be edited.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Election__c,'Tri Monthly Billing and Payment - 15 basis points (0.15%)') && OR( SBQQ__LowerBound__c <> 13, SBQQ__UpperBound__c <> 15, Basis_Points__c <> 15 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Early Pay Tiers can be deleted, but values cannot be edited.
